Issue.creator: evelynevergreene
Issue.summary: Indy-cli not allowing re-connect to pool after exiting.
Issue.environment: STN, which is a protocol_version=1 pool, currently
Issue.description: pool create stn gen_txn_file=pool_transactions_STN_genesis Pool config "stn" has been created indy> pool connect stn protocol-version=1 Pool "stn" has been connected pool(stn):indy> pool disconnect Pool "stn" has been disconnected indy> exit Goodbye... vagrant@indyCli2:~$ indy-cli indy> pool connect stn Pool "stn" are not compatible with Protocol Version "2". indy> pool connect stn protocol-version=1 Pool "stn" has not been connected. indy> {code} >
